title: Cappelletto Allegra Wood Print Rack Premium Large Display, Storage Rack for Poster, Prints, Panels Art Shows - Natural
features: The Cappelletto Allegra Premium Wood Print Rack provides an ideal way to keep your finished prints, canvases, and framed artwork safe! Made of only the finest hand-picked wood, this smooth sanded oil-stained Beechwood print rack has durable hard-plastic casters for mobility and a rubber anti-slip mat.
Premium Print Rack Imported from Italy. Handmade in Italy, the finest beechwood and craftsmanship.

Easy to put together and the casters are sturdy. It rolls smoothly and is of high quality. Durable hard-plastic casters for mobility. The bed is wider than most and has a rubber base which is practical for stacking paintings.
Fits canvases up to 60". The bed is wider than most and has a rubber base which is practical for stacking paintings.
Materials: Oiled stain resistant beech wood. Weight: 13 lbs. Dimensions: 28" x 20" x 28". Base dimensions: 28x20.5". Fits pieces up to 48" x 60". Max canvas height: 47".
